alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 9:29PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern El Paso County through 1000 PM MDT... At 929 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Truckton, or 32 miles east of Colorado Springs, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain and potential Flash Flooding, along with nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Truckton around 935 PM MDT. Rush around 945 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft
